package demopack;

public class pb1 {

public static void main(String[] args) {
// TODO Auto-generated method stub
//nested loops works -
int k=1;
for(int i=0;i<4;i++)  //(outer for loop) this block will loop for 4 times
{
//System.out.println( "outer loop started");
for(int j=1;j<=4-i;j++) // inner loop
{
System.out.print( k);
System.out.print("\t");
k++;
}
//System.out.println( "");
}
}
}
